1.name: Baby
1.content: My name is Kranberry Wittlestick. I am a viking, part of a village of wise, strong, and beautiful specimens of the human form.

2.name: Teen
2.content: While I grew wise in my teenage years, I was not strong or beautiful. So lady viking didn't even look twice. Don't worry they said, once you start raiding you'd at least gain muscles and wealth.

3.name: 30s
3.content: By 33, I'd raided for years but never has success that everyone else had, I as last to the treasure, and didn't have the strength to push others out of the way or keep up over long distances.

4.name: 50s
4.content: At 58 my stomach was always empty, and I didn't even have 2 coins to rub together. I also still had never experienced the touch of a woman. One day I heard legend that a man with nothing could still get woman if he had a bearskin hat. So off I went - to slay a bear!

5.name: 70s
5.content: I failed many times, and each failure took me months to recover from. After 15 years however I slew a bear - skinned it and make myself a hat and cloak. Now was my chance.... however no woman have me. I gave up.

6.name: Death
6.content: The sadness was too great for his old heart, and he felt his soul leaving him as darkness closed all around him.

7.name: Death 2
7.content: Minutes dragged into hours. The emptiness was oppressive.

8.name: Death 3
8.content: After what felt like a an eternity he started to feel a warmth around him. And muffled sounds started to reach him - he could make out a cadience that sounded like a voice - but the words escaped him.

9.name: Farm
9.content: oh mercy may - my prized golden egg. It might have cost me 1000 gold, but surely the meat from whatever creature comes out of this one, will be worth the squeeze.

10.name: Egg Wiggle
10.content: Oh my - is it starting to finally move? Oh my hooves and hay! This is a wild moment for sure. Am I ready to handle the massive monster that this egg will birth!

11.name: Egg Move
11.content: I wonder what will be inside - it could be a bear, elephant, maybe even a dinosaur!

12.name: Egg Crack 1
12.content: oh my goodness - it's hovering and its cracking. I've never seen and egg with this much power before!

13.name: Egg Crack 2
13.content: this is blowing my mind completely. There is no way this could get more extreme!

14.name: Egg Crack 3
14.content: Ok this is just overkill, I don't have all day! No one is going to want to wait through any more of this egg hatching BS.

15.name: Egg Man Burst
15.content: What scrawny creature is this? It looks so weak and pathetic.

16.name: Egg Man
16.content: I must have been ripped off - there's no way this creature is worth the money I paid.

17.name: Egg Man 2
17.content: I might as well butcher it now and sell whatever meat I get as a daily special.

18.name: Egg Man 3
18.content: Unless.... maybe I just need to bulk it up with some food.

19.name: Egg Man 4
19.content: And I mean, I do make food for a living - so it's not like I couldn't give it a go on the cheap. These mantis eggs basically reproduce quicker then I can hatch them anyways.

20.name: Egg Man 5
20.content: Guess I just need to harvest some of these cheap mantis a bit early and serve up some of my specialty.

21.name: Egg Man 6
21.content: A quick visit over to the butcher - why didn't I just get them to kill that thing? I keep forgetting they can kill and process the animals!

22.name: Mantis Food 1
22.content: Now eat up and grow big and strong. I can't wait to see what you might just turn into.

23.name: Mantis Food 2
23.content: Busty cow lady woman - you offer me a meal in hopes that I'll become something more then I am now - but I'm sorry to disappoint. I've always been nothing more then this miserable man you see before you.

24.name: Mantis Food 3
24.content: You can speak? But almost no egg animals can do that! And is that fur even yours? This is getting confusing.

25.name: Mantis Food 4
25.content: Hey now, I might take many an insults laying down - but I won't take being called an animal! I am a man, and a smart one at that.

26.name: Mantis Food 5
26.content: If you're as smart as you say - the easiest way to prove you aren't an egg animal is to run a small farm yourself. No egg animal has the intelligence to do that (and remain profitable that is)

27.name: Mantis Food 6
27.content: Run this mantis farm and earn a tidy profit and I might just consider that you aren't an egg animal - even though I literally watched you hatch out of an egg.
